name: WORKING TITLE (swordlessmimetown)
description:
This is the page dedicated to my first visual novel project, WORKING TITLE. That's what it's called.

The image for the game is placeholder and will be replaced upon release, it's the only thing I had handy that fit the dimensions.

All images currently in the game are placeholder.

The story is simple; there's an intro, then one character makes a choice, a second character makes a choice, and then there's an outcome. Four possible endings. Almost.

This is an autobiographical story about a confused young man coming to terms with his identity.

Things get weird when you go for the second ending. 

The full game ends at New Game++. Less than an hour long total(?). 

Feedback is appreciated.
